description.value:
Relic Staff of the White Scars. When used by a Stormseer, whenever they suffer Perils of the Warp they may adjust the roll by up to 10 (up or down) after the dice has been rolled.

Requirements

White Scars Stormseers (Librarians) only.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 15 R
description.summary: Relic Staff of the White Scars. When used by a Stormseer, whenever they suffer Perils of the Warp they may adjust the roll by up to 10 (up or down) after the dice has been rolled.

system.effect: Relic Staff of the White Scars. When used by a Stormseer, whenever they suffer Perils of the Warp they may adjust the roll by up to 10 (up or down) after the dice has been rolled.
